row.name: PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.JOB.PROJECT_USER_LIST@GENERIC
row.description: Retrieve lookup list for user project field

row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF
:INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION ! Logging input parameters :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Base URL" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Auth Token" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Domain Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Project Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :SET &AGENT_CURR_DIR# = GET_VAR('UC_EX_PATH_TEMP', &AGENT#) :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_USERS_FILE_PATH# = "projectUserList-&$RUNID#.xml" :SET &UC4RB_HPQC_USERS_FILE_PATH# = STR_CAT(&AGENT_CURR_DIR#,&UC4RB_HPQC_USERS_FILE_PATH#)
:SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME# = "DEFECT_ASSOICATED_USERS_LIST"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#, string, 14
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[2] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[3] = "-baseurl" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_BASE_URL#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[4] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[5] = "-domain" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_DOMAIN_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[6] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[7] = "-project" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_PROJECT_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[8] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[11] = "-filepath" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_USERS_FILE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[12] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[13] = "-authtokenid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_HPQC_AUTH_TOKEN#" : SET &UC4RB_HPQC_ARGUMENTS#[14] = "&UC4RB_HPQC_OPTION_VALUE#"
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGUMENTS
! Setting execution environment : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PUB.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
java -jar &UC4RB_HPQC_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_HPQC_JAVA_ARGUMENTS#
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** PROJECT USER LIST ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** PROJECT USER LIST ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- !Printing faliure messages as per Error code : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_HPQC.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS
